notes: No explicit normative relationship or constraint between sn-FieldLength and t-PollRetransmit is provided in the evidence.

meta.evidence: \begin{tabular}{l} sn-FieldLength Indicates the RLC SN field size, see TS 38.322 [4], in bits. Value size 6 means 6 bits, value size 12 means 12 bits, value size 18 means 18 bits. The value of sn-FieldLength for a DRB/multicast MRB shall be changed only using reconfiguration with sync. The network configures only value size 12 in SN-FieldLengthAM for SRB. \end{tabular} \begin{tabular}{l} t-PollRetransmit Timer for RLC AM in TS 38.322 [4], in milliseconds. Value m s 5 means 5 ms , value m s 10 means 10 ms and so on. \end{tabular}
